oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Manifestation of interdot spin tunneling effects in ordered arrays of quantum dots: An anomalous magnetization of In_{1-x}Mn_xAs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sergeenkov, Serge
Ausloos, Marcel
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Condensed Matter - Mesoscale and Nanoscale Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The anomalous low-temperature behavior of the spontaneous magnetization of ordered arrays of In_{1-x}Mn_xAs quantum dots is discussed. It is shown that the experimental results can be well understood, within a mean field approximation, assuming collective response through rather strong spin tunneling processes between neighbouring dots.
Comment: Accepted for publication in Philosophical Magazine Letters
